name: The Call
description:
• The game can last up to 1-2 hours depending on how you play.
  • It contains minor jumpscares, enemies that chase you which can be killed using your pistol and some quality puzzles.
  • The game saves which Level you are on but does not save what Checkpoint you have reached on that Level. If you restart the game, you will start from the beginning of the saved level. Keep that in mind and try to complete this game in one sitting.

We do NOT take responsibility for any damages our product may cause you in any way.

If you want to know more or support us, please check out our "website" (Steam group).
